dmca.title: Your ebanned registration
dmca.body:
To whom it may concern

If you read within our policies, since we are a member based website, we
reserve the right to refuse membership to anyone. The initial comments that
were posted at http://www.hatesville.com in no way reflect the type of
people that we allow to have association with our website. Since you are, in
some capacity, an active member at hatesville.com, up to and including
making posts on that website, we are not in a position to assume that you
would also like to join our website and abide by our terms and conditions,
as you also make posts at a website that apparently does not condone the
activities that we do at Ebanned. We would have no reason to believe that
you would risk your association with hatesville.com to become a member of
our website, and obviously make it known by posting the refusal email from
us on the front page of hatesville. That is precisely why your registration
was denied.

Furthermore, we are requesting that you immediately remove the first and
last name of the founder and CEO of Ebanned, Inc., Marie Curtis, be removed
from the front page of http://www.hatesville.com. This request will be met
within 24 hours of Thursday March 21, 2002 2:10pm central time. Failure to
abide by this request will result in immediate legal action.

Also, for future reference. The website, http://www.hatesville.com does not
have permission to use direct links to our website, or to any of the pages,
up to and including specific auctions or the use of our search function
within our website, http://www.ebanned.net. This is a direct violation of
internet law. If this request is not abided by immediately, and at any time
in the future, we will persue legal action on this matter as well.

Regards,
Bart
Ebanned Legal/Financial Dept
Ebanned, Inc.

http://www.ebanned.net
